definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: After forwarding the duke's invitation, he was eager to leave since he didn't want to stay at the shabby and stinking lane.
sentences.chinese: 在這個臭氣沖天的陋巷內，他是一分鐘也不想多待。
